document.full_text: an elderly woman was sentenced on wednesday to up to three years in prison for failing to help her 6-year-old granddaughter when she caught fire during a voodoo ritual, authorities said.
document.title: grandmother sentenced to prison in voodoo burning case
lines_and_colors: an elderly woman was sentenced on wednesday to up to three years in prison for failing to help her 6-year-old granddaughter when she caught fire during a voodoo ritual, authorities said.
